name: Parmesan Ranch Popcorn
description: Gear up for game day snacking! Just toss your popcorn with a generous amount of Parmesan cheese or Cheesy Fries Seasoning and a secret ingredient – Creamy Ranch Dip Mix! It’s a touchdown of flavour that’s cheesy & tangy that’ll have you and your pals doing the end zone dance. Game on!

ingredients.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix or Caesar Dressing Mix

preparation: Place kernels in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 5–6 min or until popping has slowed down. Pour into a large bowl. Discard any un-popped kernels.
Spritz or toss popcorn with oil; sprinkle cheese and dip mix on top. Toss well to coat popcorn. Add more dip mix, to taste.
tips: Serve in small bowls (like Prep Bowls) or napkins for an easy and tasty appetizer!

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favorite.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavor, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
